TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NavigationFailedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ces arguments d’événement contiennent des informations sur une barre de navigation qui a échoué et est passé aux gestionnaires de la **NavigationFailed** événement, qui est implémentée par les éléments suivants :These event arguments contain information about a navigation that failed, and are passed to handlers of the **NavigationFailed** event, which is implemented by the following: - - - - encapsule les détails suivants de la requête de navigation a échoué : encapsulates the following details of the failed navigation request: - **Initiation de la navigation**: .**Navigation Initiation**: . - **Exception de navigation**: , .**Navigation Exception**: , . - **Contenu de la navigation**: .**Navigation Content**: . - **Détails de la navigation**: , .**Navigation Details**: , . - **État de la navigation**: .**Navigation State**: .

public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the that was raised as the result of a failed navigation.

span.span: The that was raised as the result of a failed navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks correspond à un ou un will be either a or an

summary.span: Gets the optional data that was passed when navigation commenced.

span.span: The optional data that was passed when navigation commenced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks peut être utilisé pour passer des données spécifiques au contexte qui sont spécifiques à une navigation particulière. can be used to pass context-specific data that is specific to a particular navigation. contient une référence à l’objet qui est passé comme deuxième argument lors de l’appel soit ou . contains a reference to the object that is passed as the second argument when calling either or . Sinon, il s'agit de `null`.Otherwise, it is `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Handled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets whether the failed navigation exception has been handled.

span.span: Gets or sets whether the failed navigation exception has been handled.

value.span: Si l’exception est gérée ; dans le cas contraire, (par défaut).

span.span: if the exception is handled; otherwise, (default).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Lorsque vous gérez au processus, une exception est levée à la suite d’un échec de la navigation et que vous ne souhaitez pas [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] pour continuer le traitement de l’exception, vous devez définir le propriété `true`.When you handle to process an exception that is thrown as a result of a failed navigation, and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to continue processing the exception, you should set the property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebRequest As WebRequest
public: property System::Net::WebRequest ^ WebRequest { System::Net::WebRequest ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the web request that was used to request the specified content.

span.span: Gets the web request that was used to request the specified content.

value.span: Obtient le objet qui a été utilisé pour demander le contenu spécifié.

span.span: Gets the object that was used to request the specified content.

value.span: Si la navigation vers un objet, est .

span.span: If navigating to an object, is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks est une classe de base abstraite qui encapsule une requête web, et n’est pas du protocole. is an abstract base class that encapsulates a web request, and is protocol agnostic. Pour chaque protocole commun, le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] inclut une classe qui dérive de et les étend avec un état spécifique au protocole et le comportement, notamment :For each common protocol, the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] includes a class that derives from and extends it with protocol-specific state and behavior, including: - : [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `pack://` schéma de la requête de fichiers de données d’application (consultez [ressource d’Application WPF, contenu et les fichiers de données](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). - : [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `http://` schéma pour demander des fichiers à partir de serveurs Web.: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers. - : [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `ftp://` schéma pour demander des fichiers à partir de serveurs FTP.: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers. - : [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `file://` schéma pour demander des fichiers locaux.: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebResponse As WebResponse
public: property System::Net::WebResponse ^ WebResponse { System::Net::WebResponse ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the web response that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.

span.span: Gets the web response that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.

value.span: Le retourné à l’issue de la tentative de téléchargement demandé le contenu spécifié.

span.span: The that was returned after attempting to download the requested the specified content.

value.span: Si le volet de navigation a échoué, est .

remarks.format: ## Remarks est une classe de base abstraite qui encapsule une réponse web, et n’est pas du protocole. is an abstract base class that encapsulates a web response, and is protocol agnostic. Pour chaque protocole commun, le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] inclut une classe qui dérive de et les étend avec l’état spécifique au protocole, y compris :For each common protocol, the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlewinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlewinfx-md.md)] includes a class that derives from and extends it with protocol-specific state, including: - : [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `pack://` schéma de la requête de fichiers de données d’application (consultez [ressource d’Application WPF, contenu et les fichiers de données](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `pack://` scheme to request application data files (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). - : [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `http://` schéma pour demander des fichiers à partir de serveurs Web.: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `http://` scheme to request files from Web servers. - : [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `ftp://` schéma pour demander des fichiers à partir de serveurs FTP.: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `ftp://` scheme to request files from FTP servers. - : [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] qui utilisent le `file://` schéma pour demander des fichiers locaux.: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] that use the `file://` scheme to request local files.
